评论详情: I ordered the black with orange tint lens.. I find them to just be ok. To me they look and feel a little cheap, I do believe now that a different color or solid black all around would’ve looked so much better. I don’t blame myself for ordering this color because if it’s an option, it shouldn’t look cheaper than the rest. Anyway, I don’t think I’ll be reaching for these much, since they look like the types of glasses that are included with costumes, you know the type.
Love the quality, the look and price of these sunnies! They are a dupe of another mid range brand and so versatile, perfect accessory to your daily outfit!

I really like the look of these sunglasses, however they are not flattering on me so I will have to return them. Aside from that, they look like designer glasses at a fraction of the cost. I didn't wear them other than trying them on, but they seemed like they would offer good sun protection. The fit was great...they just didn't look good on me (sad). Great quality and great value. I feel like they would flattering most faces, just not mine! Lol
These area really cool, retro-styled sunglasses. They have a great look and a great fit. Very well made, very sturdy.

These sunglasses have become a new favorite for me. I have them in the transparent brown color and they are gorgeous, large, and have a little weight to them. I like the brown lenses as well. I am actually wearing them as I type this review, at night. That is right, I like them so much I am even wearing them at night. Cue the song. You know the one.  I'm considering getting more of this style in other colors. At the very least, I intend to try out other glasses from the same company as these particular sunglasses, Vanlinker.  Highly recommend them, especially in the transparent brown.
This eyewear indicates individual style and gives the wearer an air of confidence and states level of uniqueness.  Slightly heavy for eyewear and could be a nuisance if a woman wears makeup.

these are so cute. I love the quality. they are very trendy right now. they protect your eyes from the sun. definitely do their job! they are comfortable on love that they don’t have the little clear things on them.

2 things I love about these shades are that the high middle section fits a high nose bridge--that's hard to find--and the nose pieces are plastic and attached so I can be free to lift on/off my head with no hair tangling.  One critique I have is that these are marketed for men and women like unisex style while they are pretty wide for women. Take that with a grain of salt because I have a long, narrow face that will accentuate width for sure.  I chose the transparent brown and I was worried they'd be useless for sun protection, especially since I have blue eyes, but they did in fact block some sun on an ATV ride and I was glad I brought them along.  I love affordable sunglasses as I find that sunglasses are impossible to handle delicately and serve no purpose if I can't throw them in a purse (in a case or bag), toss them on my head or in my shirt collar without scratching them. These don't seem to scratch easily (our ATV ride was dusty) and they aren't flimsy to where they snap with minor bumps and drops. I approve!  C10 transparent brown style is really cute and bold style

I think these glasses are the perfect brown color that will be dark during the day but it's not black like all my other black glasses. I like that these don't sit on the nose because that can give me a headache sometimes.  These feel like they fit really well on my face but I do think they can also be unisex as they're not overly feminine. They're fun and cute I would recommend these to anyone who wants a fun vintage looking pair of aviators.
so well made highly recommend giftable 10/10 in my humble opinion great value for your money
